name: WP reCaptcha
author: WPreCaptcha.com

sections.description:
WP reCAPTCHA protects your site from spam and abuse. It uses advanced risk analysis techniques to tell humans and bots apart.

WP recaptcha is the only WP Plugin curretly offering reCAPTCHA v3 for Gravity Forms.

WP recaptcha Supports all Google reCAPTCHA versions:
* Version 3
* Version 2 – checkbox
* Version 2 – invisible

WP recaptcha is very simple to use! just select the page that contains the form – WP recaptcha will automatically generate the required recaptcha code.

View Demo

Free Features

  • Add Google reCAPTCHA to:
    • Login Form
    • Register Form
    • Lost Password Form
    • Reset Password Form
    • Comments Form
  • Disable Google reCAPTCHA for registered users
  • Select Google reCAPTCHA language manually or Switch Languages Automatically.
  • Supports Google reCAPTCHA:
    • Version 3
    • Version 2 – checkbox
    • Version 2 – invisible
  • Available Google reCAPTCHA extended settings for:
    • Version 3
      • Hide badge for Desktop devices
      • Hide badge for Mobile devices
    • Version 2 – checkbox
      • Select theme
        • Light
        • Dark
      • Select Size
        • Normal
        • Compact
    • Version 2 – invisible
      • Select Google badge position:
        • Bottom Right
        • Bottom Left
        • Inline
      • Hide badge for Desktop devices
      • Hide badge for Mobile devices
  • Compatible with latest WordPress version
  • Configure all subsites on the network

Pro Features

All features from Free version included plus:
* Compatible with:
* Gravity Forms
* Contact Form 7
* Jetpack Contact Form
* Contact Form by WPForms
* MailChimp for WordPress
* Compatible with Woocommerce:
* Login Form
* Register Form
* Lost Password Form
* Order Form
* IndividualSettings for each form use Shortcode Generator
* 24x7x365 support

Upgrade to Pro
sections.installation:
1. If You have any Google reCAPTCHA integrations for your forms – please disable the integrations.
  2. If you have any other Google reCAPTCHA plugins – please deactivate or uninstall the plugins before use wpRECAPTCHA.
  3. Upload the wr-recaptcha folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin via the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  5. Go to WP reCaptcha “Settings” tab

short_description: Add Google reCaptcha to WordPress forms. Easy to add, advanced security for your forms.
